description: Retrieves properties and current status of a game session placement request. To get game session placement details, specify the placement ID. If successful, a GameSessionPlacement object is returned. Game-session-related operations include:    CreateGameSession     DescribeGameSessions     DescribeGameSessionDetails     SearchGameSessions     UpdateGameSession     GetGameSessionLogUrl    Game session placements    StartGameSessionPlacement     DescribeGameSessionPlacement     StopGameSessionPlacement
